D

doAll(String) - Static method in class it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.normalizer.StringNormalizer
This method remove from the given string the follow characters: \t,\n, |, -, \ and /
Also removes all the '.' characters from the bottom of the string and replace the Accent Characters whit the respective non-accent.

U

unZipAll(boolean) - Method in class it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file.UnZipper
This method unzip all the zip content into the destination folder given.
Pass true as argument if you want to skip the file if it's already exists into destination folder, otherwise it will be rewritten.
UnZipper - Class in it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file
This class provide the common method to unzip a .zip file.
How to use:
UnZipper(File, File) - Constructor for class it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file.UnZipper
Instance the UnZipper object to unzip all the content into destination folder given.
unZipSelective(List<String>) - Method in class it.hackcaffebabe.ioutil.file.UnZipper
This method extract from zip all the file that are into the list of String given.
The string inside the list must be exactly the same as the name of file into the zip, otherwise this method will skip it.
